description: This algorithm will pull the path to an image (RGB png currently supported) and image bounds (as defined by leaflet) from the chain ledger and re-enter this information with the correct keys needed by the Algorithm Toolkit to send an image back to a chain endpoint request for placement onto a map.
name: output_image_to_client

outputs.description: Path of image to send to client
outputs.name: image_url

outputs.description: Array containing the leaflet bounds of image extent
outputs.name: image_extent

required_parameters.description: Path of image to send to client
required_parameters.name: image_path

required_parameters.description: Array containing the leaflet bounds of image extent
required_parameters.help_text: String array containing image bounds numbers.
required_parameters.name: image_bounds
